website_summaries.verdict: A great small wine cellar for anyone with a small inventory or wanting to try a separate fridge without spending a fortune.
pros: Takes up very little space and can be used on a kitchen counter
Clear directions regarding proper setup and setting the temperature control
Large bottles will fit on the bottom if the shelf is removed
cons: Some users feel the LED display light on the front of the cooler is way too bright

customer_reviews.title: Controls on front panel stopped working shortly after purchase
customer_reviews.text: The touch controls stopped working on this wine cellar but it is quiet and does its job fairly well. Doesn’t fit champagne bottles. EDIT: Customer service was tremendous and shipped me a new one at no charge. Thanks! EDIT: Second one encountered same problem and has appeared to stop cooling, even though fan still runs.
customer_reviews.author: Parker Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and simple
customer_reviews.text: I've had one of these for a year, and just purchased a second one (red and whites, after all :-) ). I've had no trouble whatsoever, the controls are simple, and they look sharp. I bought a shelf (sturdy) to stack them in the photo. (Don't forget to read the instructions to hold the "unlock" button to make the controls do anything!) I could wish for a bit colder low temp, but I'm sure that would cost more or be louder.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a few month! Ruined all the wines!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a few month ago and it works ok before. Today I suddenly found that the temperature is at 90 F instead to 58 F!!! Not only are my wine warm, some of them also leak a little!! Check the photos!! The value of these bottles of wine is over $1000!! I am really mad! Please solve this!
customer_reviews.author: Flora

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product it is not what it looks like
customer_reviews.text: This product is not like the picture people. It is so much smaller and I cannot believe that I ordered it. It does not fit on a table easily or on the floor easily. And it does not fit wine bottles. It’s too tight ..
customer_reviews.author: Candace Williams

customer_reviews.title: Perfect wine frig!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this frig. I waited it seems like forever for it to be in stock and so glad I did! It has held its temperature now for over a month and counting... but I foresee no issues and for the price so-so worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Marlene

customer_reviews.title: Keeps your wine cold.
customer_reviews.text: It does a great job of chilling your wine, especially below 50 Degrees F because many coolers won’t go that cold. It’s quiet and compact. The only negative is that the instruction book is not written clearly and in mouse print.
customer_reviews.author: Frank A. Racioppi

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement frig
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as my old one broke down. Surprised at the cost, as my last one was very similar to this one and much more expensive. Wish the shelves were a little more forgiving. Wine bottles fit fine but a bottle of champagne is a tight fit. (Always keep a bottle on hand). My last frig would allow the shelf a little wiggle room to allow a champagne bottle in
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: Looks attractive, quiet function but won't keep wine cold in a heatwave
customer_reviews.text: We bought the cooler during last winter and were very pleased with its looks and quiet function sitting on our kitchen counter. Unfortunately, now summer is here and room temperatures are going up, so is the temperature of the wine. It has been set to 48F (the minimum) and with room temps in the 65-75F range so far, is running at about 55F. The supplier confirmed the unit does not actually refrigerate so just maintains a difference between room and cooler - as the room temp goes up, so does the cooler temp. It still chills the wine, but don't put it somewhere that is going to get hot during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Airhead

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the wine at the perfect temp.
customer_reviews.text: The wife loves it. Keeps the wine at the perfect temp.
customer_reviews.author: Tim.

customer_reviews.title: Quiet!  Chills perfectly.  Has an interior light!
customer_reviews.text: I was not expecting to be so impressed. I though it would just be a little noisy fridge or semi fridge where it just cools a few degrees colder to the outside ambient air. Boy was I wrong. I want a 200 bottle one now.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Nice look
customer_reviews.text: Very narrow site on our bar holds 8 bottles looks more expensive than cost it’s black and digital
customer_reviews.author: TONYA T

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this cooler for a few days, but so far I like it very much indeed. It is attractive; its adjustments are easy to figure out; and it's working perfectly. Of course, my earlier ones (different brand) worked well to begin with also.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Nice little wine fridge.. "8 bottles" depends on the type of bottle though..
customer_reviews.text: Very nice little wine fridge. Just beware that the 8 bottle rating depends on the bottle. I had to take the racks out to get 6 bottles of pinot noir in.
customer_reviews.author: Joe P. Dougherty

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for us; we’re also, giving as a gift for others
customer_reviews.text: This wine cooler refrigerator is beautifully designed to look great in a variety of locations in our home. The motor runs so quietly & now we always have chilled wine available to share with family & friends without having to take up so much space in our kitchen’s refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's an inexpensive thermoelectric cooler so don't expect the performance of a refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: It has a hard time getting to and staying at 46 degrees. Mine is set at 46 but usually hovers around 51. It really seems like it can't get more than 20 degrees below the ambient temperature. Wider bottles will be a tight squeeze and will actually lift the shelf above slightly. Quieter than my Keurig.
customer_reviews.author: Customer1850

customer_reviews.title: LOUD NOISE
customer_reviews.text: Keep making loud noise after only 5 months use!!! Sounds like the motor is broken. Don't buy if you intend to use it for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: fanfansi

customer_reviews.title: Great Wine Cooler
customer_reviews.text: Love my Ivation 8 bottle wine cooler, especially after finding out a large bottle fits on the bottom if you take the bottom shelf out. It's quiet and maintains the proper temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: temp. control
customer_reviews.text: The big problem with this product is you can't turn the temp. down to cold for white wine . I like my white wine very cold and this product doesn't even come close
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My wife loved it. Fits anywhere and price is awesome
customer_reviews.text: It looks sexy in the living room. Interior lighting and soft touch controls on the front panel gives it a high end look. My wife loved it. Fits anywhere and price is awesome. Easy to remove racks and just stack large wine bottles instead of small ones.
customer_reviews.author: Marlon Abreu

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my needs. It cools just enough bottles for a small party. It fits on my counter. It looks nice. I've had it only a week, but it seems to be running well.
customer_reviews.author: Tish

customer_reviews.title: Working well with almost no effort
customer_reviews.text: A small, countertop wine cooler that's just right for keeping a few whites cool and ready to go. Attractive design, no set up - just plug and play. Stabilized in 4-6 hours and has run quietly and efficiently for the last month. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Smith

customer_reviews.title: Wine chiller
customer_reviews.text: Great but wish the temp setting was easier to set, light very bright.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Grant123

customer_reviews.title: Good value, good price
customer_reviews.text: Luv it! Good value, good price. Nice size. Does exactly what it's intended to do. Good adjustable temperature control.
customer_reviews.author: lo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for us.
customer_reviews.text: Fits in a small space and, unlike a previous wine fridge we had, it is absolutely silent - a big plus!
customer_reviews.author: Keith Mac

customer_reviews.title: Time will tell
customer_reviews.text: The wine cooler is working fine so far, only a few weeks out. the only reason I don't give it a higher rating is I don't know how long it will last, because the similar one that I had before was fine while it lasted, but it quit working after 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: W. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This cooler is very small. I had to take a shelf out to accommodate a bottle of moscoto. I don't care for dry wines and most red wines are to strong for me. It did not accommodate 8 bottles. Maybe 6.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: working great so far
customer_reviews.text: It's working great so far. The LED temperature on the front is REALLY bright, but other than that I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: aggietwins03

customer_reviews.title: Nice Unit
customer_reviews.text: This is our third counter top wine cooler. Very nice looking and works perfectly. Hoping I get more than the typical 3 years out of this one. Well packaged and shipped quickly. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: J.D. Knight

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I thought.
customer_reviews.text: It's a lot smaller than I expected, But it's a nice cooler. Didn't realize until receiving it that no bottles stand up they all lay down.
customer_reviews.author: betty mcgee

customer_reviews.title: Star purchase
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughters, the wine drinkers in the house. They rave every day about this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I received this product as a gift and absolutely love it ! It keeps my red wine at the perfect temp :)
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Padilla

customer_reviews.title: It works really well
customer_reviews.text: This wine cooler works really well as it does a great job of ensuring that the temperature stays the same throughout.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe Rangdale

customer_reviews.title: Nice and neat
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my wife for Valentine's day. Works great and not too big. Can keep on kitchen counter.
customer_reviews.author: donald morrison

customer_reviews.title: You can count on it
customer_reviews.text: You can count on this wine cooler to make sure that the temperature is always the same.
customer_reviews.author: Thacher

customer_reviews.title: temperature display on front is bright
customer_reviews.text: Bought as replacement for a similar model by different brand. Happy with it. Fits on my kitchen counter that is pantry deep in width.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about this cooler It’s very quiet and works great. This cooler keeps my wine cold and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: redd

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement!
customer_reviews.text: Super quiet, keeps wine at specified temp, perfect small cooler.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: I am a big fan
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of this wine cooler as I finally have something that properly stores my wine!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffcoat J.

customer_reviews.title: It's a great size for my place
customer_reviews.text: This wine cooler is a great size for my place and it fits in just nicely, too.
customer_reviews.author: John Sherwood

customer_reviews.title: Fits in perfectly space designated
customer_reviews.text: For wine. I put 1star to designate very little noise from cooler🤗
customer_reviews.author: Frances F. Losch

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice compact size and is able to handle my pinot noir wine bottles.
customer_reviews.author: VMN

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's what I expected and I'm well satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Tharpe

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 10 months, but good service department
customer_reviews.text: It broke after 10 months of use but was great while it worked. I will update this review and increase stars depending on how customer service and warranty coverage is handled. Update: Customer service replaced the unit without giving me any runaround and their email ticket system was reasonably decent to work with.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Unit
customer_reviews.text: Have owned several 6 bottle wine coolers that ALWAYS expire shortly after their warranty. Purchased extended service with one unit, it expired 1 month after the extended warranty expired. This unit with the Thermoelectric feature I was told are MUCH better. The unit fits nicely under my kitchen cabinets and is very attractive and keeps accurate temps. As the others it is spaced properly. It arrived earlier than promised by USPS. Have had this unit a short time but really like it and hope it has a long life. Great unit for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck from GA.

customer_reviews.title: For the Perfect Wine Cooler get this one!
customer_reviews.text: After getting very quick delivery from this company, this is a great wine cooler! For me I set it at 50F and with in a very few hours and several bottles of wine in the unit it was at the correct temp. Also, it is so quite you don't even hear it running. I have it setting about 4 inches from the wall in back and nothing on sides of unit about 3 inches of it. The lights (2) inside the unit are also super. Can not find anything bad about this unit. Its well worth the money! rg.
customer_reviews.author: RON  GRESHAM

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my wine chilled
customer_reviews.text: It takes up about as little space as possible for 8 bottles of wine and a refrigerations unit. The temperature of the interior is easily within a couple of degrees of the what the panel reads depending on whether I believe the test thermometer or the panel. However, if you are looking for a mood place, do not put this unit there unless you cover up the panel. The temp display is very bright; it makes a good night light.
customer_reviews.author: Dasship

customer_reviews.title: Works like it is supposed to
customer_reviews.text: Plugged it in and set it to the lowest temperature and by the next day it reached the set temp and has stayed there like it should. It won't feed the dog or do the dishes but it will keep the wine chilled which is all I expected. I looks nice when closed and has a nice interior light when you open the door. I can't imagine finding one for a better price.
customer_reviews.author: Ken F. Magdic

customer_reviews.title: Works great! As advertised!
customer_reviews.text: We have enjoyed this wine cooler for exactly 3 years. The two we had prior gave us issues a year or so in to the purchase. This wine cooler has been flawless! It is gorgeous and works perfectly. If our experience is indicative of its craftsmanship and design, we consider it a 100% buy! Very very happy wife and you know what that means ;-).
customer_reviews.author: Warren Patrick McLemore

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: We have 8 bottles of wine in the cooler and they come out just the temperature we want. Only bad thing, but not a big deal, the blue LED light telling you the temperature is really, really bright. It lights up the whole room and part of the hallway at night...lol Otherwise, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Wingard

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item twice. The first one did not make it to me....Lost in shipping? Moving forward, the second order was a charm. Received 2-3 days in good codition. Nice and compact-sits under cabinet without difficulty. Temp has been maintained x a week now. Noise? I cannot hear it.... it’s great so far
customer_reviews.author: sherlock

customer_reviews.title: Quiet & good looking...
customer_reviews.text: Frankly I was looking for a small (space saving) red wine cooler that quietly chills the wind at our desired temperature and this unit filled out needs perfectly. That and the fact that I received the cooler in one day. Happy Day to you...Hippie Bob
customer_reviews.author: Hippie Bob Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Keeping white wines chill
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Sleek and slim looks nice in my dining room. Nice to chill my whites just so.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worthy the money
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves it was a mother's day gift...she has all your wine chilled and ready for her evening delight
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Good item
customer_reviews.text: It’s convienant and useful. It is a little loud though. It could be more quiet. Overall it’s been good for the price I paid. It’s a nice looking stylish component to the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Royal1

customer_reviews.title: Great wine frig
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement to my old one! Only wish door could be opened from either side
customer_reviews.author: jpierce56

customer_reviews.title: Small wine cooler
customer_reviews.text: the size is good; it appears to be working just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Magoconn

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet cooler
customer_reviews.text: This is a wine cooler to store some very expensive red wine which is going to be located in my dining room. I'm very pleased with this unit. It holds the new number of bottles I needed and is very quiet. I hope reliability is as good.
customer_reviews.author: Dutch2

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Only had for a week, but so far works flawlessly. Very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: MikeS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little wine cooler for my wife. Very happy so far with the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Architectural Casework Inc.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Product. Keeps my expensive wine nice and cool. Simple to use. Would Highly Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 37 degrees and wouldn't go warmer
customer_reviews.text: Kept our fridge st the desired temp for about a day or two, then steadily declined to about 37 degrees. No matter what we set it at, we couldn't get it warmer. Very thankful we read other reviews and bought a separate thermometer to place inside. Either way, both thermometers (our internal one, and the one displayed on the actual fridge) were indicating that we were in the 30s. Sent the fridge back for a refund. Thanks for freezing our wine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Ivation 8 Bottle Red And White Wine Thermoelectric Wine Cooler/Chiller Counter Top Wine Cellar with Digital Temperature Display, Freestanding Refrigerator Smoked Glass Door Quiet Operation Fridge
product_meta.description:
The Ivation Wine Cooler keeps your wine at the correct & consistent temperature and stable environment, protecting the wine from exterior lights and elements, and is specially built to have zero vibration, so the wine could be aged and stored properly, enabling it to preserve and develop its delicious flavor, Color and Aroma, with the best possible mouthfeel, body, palette and finish, serving you the best and tastiest wine that is Full, Rich, Supple, Smooth, Round, and Balanced 

A Must Have for Wine Lovers and Collectors
The only way to properly protect your wine is to store them in the Ivation temperature-controlled beautifully designed wine cooler, even for short term storage. Serving temperature has a big effect on how a wine smells, tastes and feels in your mouth, even a very good wine can be awful at the wrong temperature, likewise improper temperature can also shorten the wine’s life or ruin the wine completely, Regular refrigerators are not an option, as they are too cold for most wines, and “Room temperature” is too warm. 

Features & Specifications
Maintains the perfect temperature for red and white wines
Efficient thermoelectric cooling
Low noise, low vibration – will not disturb sediment
Touch controls and LCD display
Soft interior lighting with on/off control
Tempered smoked glass door
Solid, CFC-free polyurethane foam insulation Rated Power: 65W
Temperature Range: 46º – 64ºF (8º – 18ºC)
Weight: Net: 20.9 lbs. (9.5kg), Gross: 24.25 lbs. (11 kg)
Unit Dimensions: 9.9" x 19.7" x 17.7" (25.2 x 50 x 45cm) 

Impotent Tip: Do not put your wine cooler in the garage. The big temperature ranges of a garage will make the cooler run too often, shortening it’s life.

Buy with confident:If you need any help regarding any of our products don’t hesitate, we have a dedicated team ready to assist you please contact us at info@myivation.com or call 866-849-3049
feature_bullets: WINE COOLER (wine Cellar / Wine Chiller) A MUST HAVE: The only way to protect the quality and taste of your wines long or short term, and ensure it AGES at a consistent level, the wine has to be stored in the correct environment and CONSISTENT TEMPERATURE, (ideally in the range of 55° F) This free standing innovative wine cooler will protect your red or white wine, preserving its quality and rich flavors, so you could enjoy its real taste to the fullest.

PERFECT Stable TEMPERATURE: The Ivation cooler enables you to store your wines short & long term in a consistent stable temp environment, and allows you to customize the temp to one that creates an ideal climate for your wines ageing process (Range 46° – 64°F (8° – 18°C), therefore bringing out the true characteristics and full flavor of your wines in the long-term.

HUMIDITY, MINIMAL LIGHT: Insulated with Solid polyurethane heavy foam (CFC-free) & Closed with Thermopane doors that are tempered smoked, to ensure an interior odor-free environment that maintains constant humidity, keeping the cork from drying out, thus preventing more air to come into contact with the wine, also to ensure darkness, blocking out sunlight and harmful UV rays that breaks down the complex molecules that create the special flavors in properly aged wines.

NO VIBRATION & SUPER QUIET: Specially built with an Energy-efficient thermoelectric cooling system with no compressor, to minimize the vibration effect and noise, allowing your wine to age and settle properly, with no disturbance to its natural occurring sediments.

FEATURES: Sleek design with exterior digital Touch controls and LCD temp (°F/°C) Soft interior lighting with on/off control 100% Customer Satisfaction GUARANTEED we stand behind our products and pride ourselves with exceptional customer service care. If you need help please contact us at info@myivation.com or call 866-849-3049.
